title: Futsuu no Joshikousei ga "Locodol" Yattemita.: Nagarekawa, Annai Shitemita.

synonyms: Futsuu no Joshikousei ga [Locodol] Yattemita. Special

alternative_titles.en: Locodol: We Tried Giving a Tour of Nagarekawa
alternative_titles.ja: 普通の女子校生が【ろこどる】やってみた。「流川、案内してみた。」

synopsis:
The Awa Awa Girls visit the Locodols hoping for a guided tour of Nagarekawa.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
